description:
A classic Prospector is probably the best all-around wilderness tripping canoe ever. Where it really shines is when loaded for week-long trips that combine lakes and rivers. For portages, the yoke is deeply sculpted to distribute weight over a wide area for greater comfort.

  • Kevlar material has an excellent strength to weight ratio
  • Subtle rocker for straight, smooth tracking
  • Suspended seats with comfortable nylon lacing
  • Standard yoke is contoured to distribute weight evenly across shoulder area during portages
  • Low maintenance aluminum trim
name: Abitibi  & Co. Prospector 17 Kevlar Canoe
